QuestData.Title: Shadebound Testimonial
QuestData.Description:
<These appear to be the pain-induced ramblings of a tormented Torghast prisoner.
Ve'nari would find value in this.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Shadebound Testimonial to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
Quite the find, Maw Walker. Firsthand information from within Torghast is rare and valuable. None who set foot in the tower return to tell the tale.
Present company excluded, of course.
